title: How to Install Mass Markings for Feralheart

steps.headline: Download the Mass Markings.
steps.description: You will need the file to install the markings. This guide uses August 22's markings by way of example.

steps.headline: Check the files.
steps.description: There should be a minimum of two files in the folder: One should be in the form of a notepad, markings.cfg. The other should just be a plain old folder - textures.

steps.headline: Open 'My Computer' or 'Computer' (it depends on which version of Windows you use).
steps.description: You should see a lot of folders and files, one of which will be named FeralHeart.

steps.headline: Open the FeralHeart folder and again you will see a lot of files.
Go back the the markings folder.
steps.description: Drag and drop the markings.cfg file into the FeralHeart folder, click replace file. This adds the new markings.

steps.headline: Replace the textures folder.
steps.description: In the FeralHeart folder you will see another folder named 'media' open this and you should see a folder named 'textures' along with a bunch of other ones. Drag and drop the 'textures' folder from the MARKINGS folder into the MEDIA folder, click replace file. This adds all the new textures for the new markings.

steps.headline: Restart FeralHeart (if it is open).
steps.description: The markings won't work if you installed them with FeralHeart open. Shut it down and re-open it and they're appear. You have all the new markings, if you are not absolutely sure they have worked, try making a new character and check the markings box. There will be quite a few more markings added.

text: Download the Mass Markings. You will need the file to install the markings. This guide uses August 22's markings by way of example. Check the files. There should be a minimum of two files in the folder: One should be in the form of a notepad, markings.cfg. The other should just be a plain old folder - textures. Open 'My Computer' or 'Computer' (it depends on which version of Windows you use). You should see a lot of folders and files, one of which will be named FeralHeart. Open the FeralHeart folder and again you will see a lot of files.  Go back the the markings folder. Drag and drop the markings.cfg file into the FeralHeart folder, click replace file. This adds the new markings. Replace the textures folder. In the FeralHeart folder you will see another folder named 'media' open this and you should see a folder named 'textures' along with a bunch of other ones. Drag and drop the 'textures' folder from the MARKINGS folder into the MEDIA folder, click replace file. This adds all the new textures for the new markings. Restart FeralHeart (if it is open). The markings won't work if you installed them with FeralHeart open. Shut it down and re-open it and they're appear. You have all the new markings, if you are not absolutely sure they have worked, try making a new character and check the markings box. There will be quite a few more markings added.
